sentences.en: A mother naturally feels protective towards her children.
sentences.cn: 做母亲的天生要保护自己的孩子.

sentences.en: Barrett was taken into protective custody.
sentences.cn: 巴雷特被保护性地监禁起来。

sentences.en: British industry was sheltered from foreign competition by protective tariffs.
sentences.cn: 保护性关税使英国工业免受国际竞争影响.

sentences.en: Glynis was beside her, putting a protective arm around her shoulders.
sentences.cn: 格莉妮丝在她身边，呵护地用胳膊搂住她的肩膀。

sentences.en: He is very protective towards his mother.
sentences.cn: 他对他的母亲呵护备至。

sentences.en: It is obligatory for all employees to wear protective clothing.
sentences.cn: 所有员工必须穿防护服装。

sentences.en: It pays to invest in protective clothing.
sentences.cn: 在防护服上投资是值得的。

sentences.en: Protective gloves reduce the absorption of chemicals through the skin.
sentences.cn: 防护手套可以减少皮肤对化学物质的吸收。

sentences.en: Protective helmets must be worn on site.
Protective measures are necessary if the city's monuments are to be preserved.
sentences.cn: 要保存城市古迹必须采取一些维护性措施。

sentences.en: Sensitive Cream will not strip away the skin's protective layer.
sentences.cn: 敏感肌肤专用面霜不会破坏皮肤表面的保护层。

sentences.en: Sunscreen provides a protective layer against the sun’s harmful rays.
sentences.cn: 防晒霜提供了一层抵挡阳光中有害光线的防护层。

sentences.en: The arrogance became his protective carapace.
sentences.cn: 这种傲慢态度成了他的保护壳。

sentences.en: We feel safe with a protective device in the house.
sentences.cn: 我们因为家里有了防护装置而感到安全.

sentences.en: Workers should wear full protective clothing .
sentences.cn: 工人应该穿着全套防护服。

words.tran_cn: 贸易保护主义的；保护贸易论的
保护主义，贸易保护主义
保护器；保护者；保护装置；防御者

防护的；关切保护的；保护贸易的

保护敷层；防护涂层；保护层
防护设备；保护装置；保护设备；防护装置

trans.tran_cn: 保护的，防护的，保护贸易的
